timeline.bodyText: Actually, we don't support short type of data yet...
timeline.author: HTHou

replies.bodyText: I think so, too. I felt weird that why it was implemented before. How about just throwing exception while it has been used?
replies.author: jack870131

timeline.bodyText: Maybe throw an exception is better? which can help users find bugs in client
timeline.author: qiaojialin

replies.bodyText: @qiaojialin The reason why I remove the exception here is that it was not consistent with JDBC specification as we discussed in IOTDB-912.
replies.author: jack870131
